ModMetaData.name: Technology Helps Children Learn Fast
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds learning rate increases to the learning assistant (if you have Royalty), and the neural supercharge (if you have Ideology). It may also contain various updates to implants of other mods if requested.
Patches for: - Royalty : Learning Assistant - Ideology : Neural Supercharge
